nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: Hello.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: I am Maximus Helios. I was the National Spelling Bee Champion and a Five-Time Winner of the Local Waffle-Eating Contest.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: Yes. I won on the word "smaragdine". It means "of or relating to emeralds." Do you know how to spell that?

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: Close, but no. It's s-m-a-r-a-g-d-i-n-e. "A" for effort.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: Not even close. It's s-m-a-r-a-g-d-i-n-e. "F" for effort.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: Wow. Don't you know I'm the National Spelling Bee Champion? I deserve more respect from you plebs. Gosh. I hate people who act so high and mighty.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: You got it? What about gesellschaft? It means an association of individual for common goals.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: Close, but no. It's g-e-s-e-l-l-s-c-h-a-f-t. "A" for effort.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: Not even close. It's g-e-s-e-l-l-s-c-h-a-f-t. "F" for effort.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: Ha. No. It's...wait. You got it right? You must be cheating!

responses.text: Well, actually. There's this thing called dialogue boxes...

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: What?

responses.text: ...and when you speak, I can see the words...

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: What?

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: What do you want?

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: I am waiting for a sign. I feel like I'm supposed to be preaching about something. I feel like I'm important.

responses.text: I think I might know what the sign is.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: Yep. I can eat waffles like no other. Another victory for the National Spelling Bee Champion.

responses.text: So, what are you doing here?

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: I hate hypocrites too! I hope you're not one. Ugh.

responses.text: So, what are you doing here?

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: I am waiting for something to fall from the sky. And then, I, Maximus Helios, will share my revelations with the world!

responses.text: I'll let you know if I see something.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: That would be great.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: Really? What is it?

responses.text: I think I saw something in the middle of that volcano over there. You should go there.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: Begone from me, unbeliever!

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: A simpleton like you? Please.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: I must see it in person to believe. I shall wait here.

nodes.speaker: prophet
nodes.text: No. I must wait here. Good day.
